translations: [内科]宿醉；遗物；残留物（hangover 的复数）

sentences.sentence: Taking Aspirin Prior to Drinking Will Prevent hangovers.
sentences.translation: 喝酒之前吃一片阿司匹林可以防止宿醉。

sentences.sentence: Some of our worst hangovers can happen when we're traveling.
sentences.translation: 我们旅行时可能会遭遇到最坏的宿醉经历。

sentences.sentence: It was about an hour later that the geese woke up. They had devastating hangovers.
sentences.translation: 约莫一个钟头以后这些鹅醒了，宿醉得要死不活。
